src:
Video: Chára aj s Cehlárikom pomohli predĺžiť víťaznú sériu Bostonu, Marinčin sa vrátil do Toronta
03 Nov 2019, 08:35 by Webnoviny
3.11.2019 (Webnoviny.sk) – V bohatom 14-zápasovom programe NHL si v sobotu zahrali štyria slovenskí hokejisti. Ani jeden z nich nebodoval, ale až traja sa tešili z víťazstva so svojimi mužstvami. Boston s obrancom Zdenom Chárom aj útočníkom Petrom Cehlárikom zdolal Ottawu 5:2, Toronta s obrancom Martinom Marinčinom zvíťazilo vo Philadelphii 4:3 po samostatných nájazdoch. Montreal s útočníkom Tomášom Tatarom prehral v Dallase 1:4. Domácim stále chýbal obranca Andrej Sekera pre zranenie.
Chára bol najvyťaženejší hráč
Aj druhý zápas Petra Cehlárika v tíme Bostonu v tejto sezóne bol víťazný. Bruins zvíťazili nad Ottawou Senators 5:2 a bol pri tom tradične aj ich kapitán Zdeno Chára. Zatiaľ čo Cehlárik po príchode z AHL odkorčuľoval iba necelých 10 minút s bilanciou 1 „hit“, 2 zablokované strely, 42-ročný Chára bol s 23:54 min na ľade najvyťaženejším hráčom svojho tímu, až 6:15 min absolvoval v oslabeniach.
Chára zablokoval tri strelecké pokusy súperových hráčov a pridal aj jeden bodyček. Cehlárik bol raz aj na trestnej lavici, pykal za chybu lavičky a priveľký počet hráčov Bostonu na ľade. V bránke Bruins dostal prednosť Tuukka Rask pred Jaroslavom Halákom, Fín si pripísal 30 zákrokov.
V zápase dvoch tímov z opačných pólov tabuľky Východnej konferencie Boston opäť potiahli hráči elitnej formácie. David Pastrňák, Brad Marchand a Patrice Bergeron nazbierali spolu 7 bodov a zaslúžili sa o piaty triumf svojho tímu v neprerušenej sérii a tiež deviaty zápas za sebou s minimálne bodom.
Sabourin ostal ležať na ľade
Marchand a Pastrňák potiahli svoje produktívne série na dvanásť, resp. jedenásť zápasov. Dovedna počas nich nazbierali 50 bodov. Pastrňák je s 27 bodmi lídrom kanadského bodovania celej súťaže, s 13 gólmi je zasa prvý medzi strelcami.
„Hráme dobre ako mužstvo a to veľmi pomáha, aby sme boli produktívni. Najdôležitejšie je, že víťazíme. Vtedy stúpa sebavedomie a hrá sa veľmi dobre,“ podotkol David Pastrňák na oficiálnom webe NHL.
Súboj Bostonu s Ottawou negatívne poznačila situácia zo štvrtej minúty, po ktorej zostal 11 minút ležať na ľade obranca Ottawy Scott Sabourin. Napokon ho museli odviezť z plochy do nemocnice na nosidlách, ale s dôkazom, že môže hýbať končatinami. Hráčom aj fanúšikom ukázal „palec hore“. K jeho zraneniu došlo pri zrážke hlavami s útočníkom Bostonu Davidom Backesom, ktorý tiež predčasne skončil.
„Bol to veľmi emotívny moment. Je to náš spoluhráč a všetci ho máme veľmi radi. On je prvý, kto urobí niečo pre druhého. Bol som otrasený, keď som ho videl ležať na ľade,“ uviedol obranca Ottawy Mark Borowiecki.
Najdlhšie nájazdy v histórii Maple Leafs
Martin Marinčin sa dostal do akcie prvýkrát od 21. októbra a pomohol Torontu k triumfu 4:3 po samostatných nájazdoch na ľade Philadelphie. Marinčin nastúpil v tretej obrannej dvojici po boku Tysona Barrieho, v zostave nahradil Jaka Muzzina.
Podľa trénera Mika Babcocka Muzzin chýbal z osobných dôvodov a tímu stále nepomohol ani jeho kapitán a jeden z útočných lídrov John Tavares, ktorý so zlomeným prstom pauzuje od 16. októbra. Slovenský obranca odohral takmer šestnásť a pol minúty a prezentoval sa jednou strelou, jednou zablokovanou strelou a jedným bodyčekom.
O triumfe Toronta rozhodol až v jedenástej sérii nájazdov švédsky útočník Andreas Johnsson. Boli to vôbec najdlhšie nájazdy v histórii klubu Toronto Maple Leafs.
„Niektorí naši hráči boli v zápase veľmi dobrí, ale v nájazdoch im to nevyšlo. Ako plynul čas, čudovali sme sa, ako je to možné, že nikto nevie dať gól. Je dobré pre Johnssona aj pre náš tím, že nakoniec rozhodol,“ komentoval tréner Toronta Mike Babcock na webe nhl.com.
Úchvatné hokejové dostihy
V drese Toronta po prvý raz až v deviatom zápase skóroval Jason Spezza. Tridsaťšesťročný veterán priebežne vyrovnal na 2:2 a bolo to takmer 17 rokov po jeho prvom zásahu v NHL. „Prvý gól v súťaži si zapamätám navždy, tento aktuálny možno nie. Bol však veľmi dôležitý pre nás v tomto zápase,“ poznamenal Spezza, držiteľ jednej zlatej a dvoch strieborných medailí z majstrovstiev sveta s tímom Kanady.
Hokejisti Edmontonu v sobotu zvíťazili na ľade Pittsburghu 2:1 po predĺžení. Na zásah hosťujúceho Colbyho Cava odpovedal v III. tretine v oslabení obranca Brian Dumoulin. Predĺženie prinieslo úchvatné hokejové dostihy s množstvom šancí na oboch stranách. Druhý bod pre „olejárov“ napokon zariadil nemecký útočník Leon Draisaitl, syn trénera tipsportligového HC Košice Petra Draisaitla. Leon Draisaitl je s 13 gólmi najlepším strelcom súťaže, spoločne s Čechom Pastrňákom.
Až 51 zákrokov si pripísal brankár Oilers Mike Smith, ktorý sa stal prvou hviezdou. Edmonton, za ktorý v sobotu opäť nenastúpil slovenský krídelník Tomáš Jurčo, je lídrom Západnej konferencie NHL a v tabuľke celej profiligy je tretí za Washingtonom a Bostonom. „Mal som naozaj veľa práce. Nikdy vopred neviete, čo sa stane. V tomto zápase na nás súper vybehol v útoku, ale dokázali sme sa ubrániť a nájsť cestu k dvom bodom,“ poznamenal Mike Smith.
Výsledkové sumáre NHL
sobota:
Boston – Ottawa 5:2 (1:1, 1:1, 3:0)Zdeno Chára odohral 23:54 min, 1 „hit“, 3 zablokované strely, Peter Cehlárik (obaja Boston) odohral 9:55 min, 1 „hit“, 2 zablokované strely
Dallas – Montreal 4:1 (1:0, 1:0, 2:1)Tomáš Tatar (Montreal) odohral 15:04 min, 4 strely, 1 mínusový bod
Philadelphia – Toronto 3:4 po sam. nájazdoch (1:1, 1:1, 1:1 – 0:0, 0:1)Martin Marinčin (Toronto) odohral 16:24 min, 1 strela, 1 „hit“, 1 zablokovaná strela

Pittsburgh – Edmonton 1:2 po predĺžení (0:0, 0:1, 1:0 – 0:1)


Nashville – New York Rangers 1:2 (0:1, 1:1, 0:0)

Los Angeles – Chicago 3:2 (2:2, 0:0, 1:0)

text:
Video: Chára and Cehlárik helped to prolong the winning series of Boston, Marina's returned to Toronto 03 Nov 2019, 08:35 by Webnoviny 3.11.2019 (Webnoviny.sk) - Four Slovak hockey players played in the rich 14-game NHL program on Saturday. Neither of them scored, but only three enjoyed winning with their teams. Boston with Zdenek Harer and forward Peter Cehlarik overcame Ottawa 5: 2, Toronto with Martin Marcin's defeated in Philadelphia 4: 3 after a single raid. Montreal lost to Tomas Tatar in Dallas 1: 4. Home still missing defender Andrej Sekera for injury. Chara was the busiest player Petr Cehlarik's second match in the Boston team this season was also victorious. The Bruins won over the Ottawa Senators 5: 2, and traditionally their captain Zdeno Chara was also present. While Cehlárik skated after less than 10 minutes with a score of 1 "hit", 2 blocked shots, 42-year-old Chára was at 23:54 min on ice the most busy player of his team, until 6:15 min in weakening. Chára blocked three shooting attempts of his opponents and added one point. Cehlarik was once on the penalty box, paying for the bench error and too many Boston players on the ice. In the goal of Bruins, Tuukka Rask took precedence over Jaroslav Halák, Finland scored 30 interventions. In the match of the two teams from the opposite poles of the East Conference table, the Boston elite again pulled the players of the elite formation. David Pastrňák, Brad Marchand and Patrice Bergeron scored a total of 7 points and earned their team's fifth triumph in an uninterrupted series, as well as the ninth consecutive match with a minimum of points. Sabourin remained on the ice Marchand and Punkster have taken their productive series to twelve, respectively. eleven matches. Skills collected 50 points. Pastrňák with 27 points is the leader of the Canadian scoring of the entire competition, with 13 goals is again the first among the shooters. “We play well as a team and that helps us to be productive. Most importantly, we win. At that time, self-confidence is rising and it plays very well, ”said David Pastrňák on the official NHL website. Boston's battle with Ottawa was negatively affected by the situation from the fourth minute, after which Ottawa's defender Scott Sabourin remained on the ice for 11 minutes. Eventually they had to take him from the area to the hospital on a stretcher, but with evidence that he could move his limbs. He showed "thumbs up" to both players and fans. He was injured in a head-on collision with Boston striker David Backes, who also ended early. “It was a very emotional moment. He's our teammate and we all love him. He is the first to do something for the second. I was shocked to see him lying on ice, ”said Ottawa defender Mark Borowiecki. The longest raids in Maple Leafs history Martin Marinčin got into action for the first time since October 21 and helped Toronto to triumph 4: 3 after a free-raid on Philadelphia ice. Marino's came in the third defensive pair alongside Tyson Barrie, replacing Jake Muzzin in the lineup. According to coach Mike Babcock, Muzzin was missing for personal reasons and the team was still not helped by his captain and one of the attacking leaders John Tavares, who has been breaking his finger with a broken finger since October 16. The Slovak defender played almost sixteen and a half minutes and presented himself with one shot, one blocked shot and one point. The Swedish striker Andreas Johnsson decided on Toronto's triumph in the eleventh season. They were the longest raids in the history of Toronto Maple Leafs. “Some of our players were very good at the match, but they didn't succeed in the raids. As time went by, we wondered how possible that no one could score a goal. It's good for both Johnson and our team to make a decision, ”said Toronto coach Mike Babcock at nhl.com. Breathtaking hockey racing Jason Spezza scored in Toronto for the first time in the ninth match. Thirty-six years old veteran continuously leveled to 2: 2 and it was almost 17 years after his first intervention in the NHL. “I remember the first goal in the competition forever, but this one may not. But it was very important to us in this match, ”said Spezza, holder of one gold and two silver medals from the World Cup with the Canadian team. Edmonton hockey players won on Saturday in Pittsburgh 2: 1 after overtime. The intervention of guest Colby Cava responded in III. third in weakening defender Brian Dumoulin. The extension brought breathtaking hockey races with many chances on both sides. The second point for the "oilers" eventually arranged German striker Leon Draisaitl, son of coach coach Tipsport League HC Kosice Petr Draisaitl. Leon Draisaitl with 13 goals is the best shooter of the competition, together with Czech Pastrňák. Up to 51 interventions were scored by Oilers goalkeeper Mike Smith, who became the first star. Edmonton, for which the Slovak wingman Tomáš Jurčo did not participate again on Saturday, is the leader of the Western NHL conference and is third behind Washington and Boston in the chart of the whole profile. “I was really busy. You never know in advance what will happen. In this match, our opponent ran out on us, but we managed to defend ourselves and find our way to two points, ”remarked Mike Smith. NHL scoreboards Saturday: Boston - Ottawa 5: 2 (1: 1, 1: 1, 3: 0) Zdeno Chára played 23:54 min, 1 hit, 3 blocked shots, Peter Cehlárik (both Boston) played 9:55 min, 1 " hit ', 2 blocked missiles Dallas - Montreal 4: 1 (1: 0, 1: 0, 2: 1) Tomas Tatar (Montreal) played 15:04 min, 4 shots, 1 minus Philadelphia - Toronto 3: 4 after Sam. raid (1: 1, 1: 1, 1: 1 - 0: 0, 0: 1) Martin Marinčin (Toronto) played 16:24 min, 1 shot, 1 hit, 1 blocked shot Pittsburgh - Edmonton 1: 2 overtime (0: 0, 0: 1, 1: 0 - 0: 1) Nashville - New York Rangers 1: 0 (0: 0, 0: 0, 0: 0) Bufalo - New York Islanders 0: 0 (0: 0, 0: 0, 0: 0) Carolina - New Jersey 3: 5 (2: 2, 1: 1, 0: 2) Columbus - Calgary 0: 3 (0: 1, 0: 1, 0: 1) Florida - Detroit 4: 0 (0: 0, 0: 0, 0: 0) Minnesota
St. St. Louis 3: 4 overtime (1: 2, 2: 0, 0: 1 - 0: 1) Arizona - Colorado 3: 0 (0: 0, 0: 0, 0: 0) San Jose - Vancouver 2: 5 (0: 2, 0: 2, 2: 1) Vegas - Winnipeg 3: 4 overtime (3: 1, 0: 0, 0: 2 - 0: 1) Los Angeles - Chicago 3: 0 (2: 0, 0: 0, 0: 0) More on Topics: NHLSource: Webnoviny.sk - Video: Chára and Cehlárik helped to prolong the winning series of Boston, Marina's returned to Toronto © SITA All rights reserved.
